about_the_game:
Uagi-Saba 2 is a creature care/breeder sim. Raise cute creatures all with their own brain, genes and unique body parts. Guide them through beautiful hand drawn environments using speech and positive/negative reinforcement. They can learn from experiences, form relationships with other creatures and breed.


Features/Mechanics

  • Explore
    A variety of biomes to explore. Snowy drifts. crystal caves, forgotten mines, magma vents and alien ruins.

  • Protect
    You are the guardian, guide your creatures safely through life. Lead them to water and bring them food. Show them the way to safety and help them avoid danger.

  • Variety
    Every creature is very different from the last. Each can be born with a variety of different body parts and genes. Body, head, ears, horns ,eyes, arms, legs, fur, scales. Color genes can also influence the individual color of body parts, including eyes. The possibilities are endless with hundreds of combinations.

  • Speak
    Learn your creatures native language by looking through old books and scrolls. When fluent you can use commands to influence creature decisions.

  • Memories

    Your creatures will form memories based on objects or locations it spends the most time around. It will even remember other creatures, form relationships and eventually mate.

  • Learn
    Your creatures will learn over time through positive and negative reinforcement and can pass on things they have learned to their offspring.

  • Evolve
    Creatures may evolve differently based on the biomes they spend most time in. Raise your creatures in a cold biome they may evolve fur and form resistance to cold. Raise your creature in a warm arid biome and they may evolve scales and form resistance to heat.

  • Food And Drink
    Your creatures will find a variety of food and drink items in the world, some good and some bad. Water containers, fruits, vegetables, nuts, berries, mushrooms and poisonous plants.

  • Breeding
    An in depth genetics system, creatures can breed and pass on their genetics. This includes body chemical genes, resistances, body party genes, skin/eye color and many more gene types. Only breed your favorite genes and create the ultimate super creature.
